content.rendered:
Directed by Avinash Dhyani.

Written by Avinash Dhyani.

Cast Avinash Dhyani(Rifleman Jaswant Singh Rawat). Prashil Rawat(Rifleman Jeet Singh). Mukesh Tiwari(Hawaldar CM Singh). Yeshi Dema(Noora). Prashant Kamboj(Rifleman Tejpal Singh). Alka Amin(Leela Rawat). Veerendra Saxena(Shri Guman Rawat (as Virendra Saxena)) . Jeeshan Ali(Rifleman Mahendhra Singh Pundir). Rudraksh Bahuguna(Rifleman Ram Singh). Prabhu Bhatt(Brother Of Jaswant). Rishi Raj Bhatt(Jemadar Pratap Singh). Sudeep Bhatt(Thief). Rohit Bisht(Army Officer). Rohit Kumar Bisht(Rifleman Gabber Singh). Satish Chand(Teacher 1). Saajan Chetri(Rifleman Bheem Singh Kandari). Subhash Devrari(Scouting Master). Suraj Dholakhandi(Rifleman Leela Singh Rawat). Varun Dutt(Thief). Mukesh Ghanshala(Thief). Happy Goyal(Rifleman Govind Negi). Sumit Gulati(Rifleman Trilok Singh Negi). Sahil Gulia(Rifleman Kanta Prasad Dasmana). Vinay Joshi(Rifleman Mayaram). Dinesh Jyada(Thief). Sushil Kamboj(Maths Teacher). V.K. Kataria(Subedaar Moolchand Negi). Ishtiaaq Khan(Rifleman Darbaan Singh). 

Language Hindi.

Producers Hemal Rawat. J.S. Rawat. Prashil Rawat. Tarun Singh Rawat. Sahil Singh.

Production JSR Productions House. JSR Productions.
